thread.title: BRIEF-PG&E Says Taking Action To Pass Along About $450 Mln In Annual Tax Savings To Its Customers​

title: BRIEF-PG&E Says Taking Action To Pass Along About $450 Mln In Annual Tax Savings To Its Customers​
text:
March 30 (Reuters) - PG&E Corp:
* PG&E PROPOSES TO REDUCE EXPECTED CUSTOMER RATE INCREASES THROUGH FEDERAL TAX SAVINGS
* ‍FILED SEVERAL RATEMAKING REQUESTS WITH CALIFORNIA PUBLIC UTILITIES COMMISSION​
* ‍TAKING ACTION TO PASS ALONG APPROXIMATELY $450 MILLION IN ANNUAL TAX SAVINGS TO ITS CUSTOMERS​
* ‍3 SEPARATE FILINGS REQUESTING TO PASS ALONG ABOUT $325 MILLION/ YEAR IN FEDERAL TAX SAVINGS FROM FEDERAL TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT FOR 2018, 2019​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
